entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 10.
